The '''Sensing Barrier''' is a giant, dome-shaped barrier placed over a designated area. The barrier is not visible to the standard eye; when viewed with certain [[dōjutsu]], it can be seen that there is a design of several circles which have the kanji for {{translation|''boundary''|界}}, and {{translation|''barrier''|結界|kekkai}} inscribed in them. When linked with a [[Sensing Water Sphere]], all [[Sensing Barrier Pass Technique|unauthorised passage]] in and out of the barrier can be detected and pinpointed.

== Trivia ==
* This barrier surrounds [[Konohagakure]] and is maintained by the village's [[Konoha Barrier Team|barrier team]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 419, pages 2-4</ref>
* In the anime, the [[Third Hokage]] promised not to change the formula of the barrier so [[Itachi Uchiha]] may sneak back in from time to time to watch over [[Sasuke Uchiha|his younger brother]].<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 359</ref>
* Despite a civilian's death, Konohagakure does not change the barrier to take note of that, as [[Koji Kashin]], clone of the long deceased [[Jiraiya]], was able to pass the barrier without triggering an alarm.
